languages.text: "Какую роль, по-вашему, в Империуме играет знание?"
"What, would you say, is the role of knowledge in the Imperium?"
languages.original_text: "Какую роль, по-вашему, в Империуме играет знание?"

traits.locale_text: "What would you say is the place of knowledge in the Imperium?"
"What would you say is the place of knowledge in the Imperium?"
"What, would you say, is the role of knowledge in the Imperium?"
"What, would you say, is the role of knowledge in the Imperium?"
"What, would you say, is the role of knowledge in the Imperium?"
"What, would you say, is the role of knowledge in the Imperium?"

languages.text: “你们认为，知识对帝国起着什么样的作用？”
languages.original_text: "What, would you say, is the role of knowledge in the Imperium?"

traits.locale_text: “你们认为，知识对帝国起着什么样的作用？”

languages.text: 「知識の役割とは、帝国において何であると君は考えている？」
languages.original_text: "What, would you say, is the role of knowledge in the Imperium?"

traits.locale_text: 「知識の役割とは、帝国において何であると君は考えている？」

languages.text: «¿Qué papel diría usted que desempeña el conocimiento en el Imperium?».
languages.original_text: "What, would you say, is the role of knowledge in the Imperium?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué papel diría usted que desempeña el conocimiento en el Imperium?».

languages.original_text: "What, would you say, is the role of knowledge in the Imperium?"

languages.text: « D'après vous, quel est le rôle de la connaissance au sein de l'Imperium ? »
languages.original_text: "What, would you say, is the role of knowledge in the Imperium?"

traits.locale_text: « D'après vous, quel est le rôle de la connaissance au sein de l'Imperium ? »

languages.text: "Wie würdet Ihr die Rolle des Wissens im Imperium beschreiben?"
languages.original_text: "What, would you say, is the role of knowledge in the Imperium?"

traits.locale_text: "Wie würdet Ihr die Rolle des Wissens im Imperium beschreiben?"
